Share Welcome to Mayport Brewing Company, where we return the beach to Mayport! Our four owners have over 100 years of collective experience at the beaches, and we’re here to bring the community together and remind everyone that Mayport IS the beach. With 40 taps, a full liquor and wine bar, and plenty of fun activities, Mayport Brewing Company is your new neighborhood spot! Website Email Mayport Brewing Co. 2152 Mayport Rd. Jacksonville, Florida 32233 Details Open in Google Maps Map Save Save Details Details Address 2152 Mayport Rd. Your cart is empty FREE DK SHIPPING ON ORDERS OVER 400 DKK // No shipping to UK Home Home Subscription Subscription Products Customer Portal Shop All products Beer IPA & Hoppy Sours Dark Beer Pilsner & Lager Bundles & Offers Merch & Giftcard Apparel Gift card Glasses Offers Events Taproom Taproom Tap List & Menu Tour & Tasting About Our cooperative & brewery The team Where to get our beers Contact Job Vacancies Events Events Contact us B2B Sales and Export If your company is interested in buying or importing our beers, you can contact our Head of Sales, Amalie Knage by email at orders@slowburn.coop or by phone at (+45) 42508240. Bookings for groups (7-100 guests) We host parties, dinners and tastings for many different groups in the ambient surroundings of the old Vridsløselille prison. We do an effort to accommodate your wishes for food and drinks. Whether you would like grilled cheese sandwiches and draft beer, a 3 course brewer's dinner with beer pairings or a tasty BBQ buffet we are here to help. Please reach out to us on taproom@slowburn.coop and hear more about our offerings. Other Inquiries For any other inquiries, you can contact us via email at info@slowburn.coop Or via phone at (+45) 31 31 35 41 Slowburn Brewing Co-op Fængselsvej 43 2620 Albertslund Denmark Opening hours in the bar: Wednesday 15:00-22:00 Thursday 15:00-22:00 Friday 15:00-24:00 Saturday 13:00-24:00 Sunday 13:00-20:00 About Slowburn Brewing Co-OP Fresh craft beer brewed by a cooperative, worker-owned microbrewery located in the old Vridsløselille prison in Albertslund, Denmark We brew a wide variety of beer styles, with a focus on quality and drinkability. Whether you enjoy crisp lagers, heavily-hopped IPAs, rich stouts, or funky mixed fermentation beers, we strive to make something for every palate. Our Story – Mayport Brewing Company Skip to content Home Events On Tap Our Story Home Events On Tap Our Story Our Story Meet the Partners The partners include Todd Bosco, Tony Cox Mark Rau and Jesse George. Three own businesses on Mayport road. They all live and have raised families in the beaches community. We believe the Mayport corridor is the next up and coming area at the beach. We love to support the local Mayport businesses and are proud to be a part of it. Mayport IS the beach. Mayport Brewing Co. (Review) | ViewFromALove Login Home Blog Reviews Press About Us Contact Us No Result View All Result Home Blog Reviews Press About Us Contact Us No Result View All Result Home Reviews Mayport Brewing Co. – Jacksonville, FL (Review) by Tim Smith April 19, 2024 in Reviews Reading Time: 10 mins read 0 0 207 VIEWS Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Pinterest Table of Contents Mayport Brewing Co. Beer About Mayport Brewing Co. Watch out Jacksonville! There is a new brewery in town – Mayport Brewing Company! Located in Jacksonville, Florida, Mayport Brewing Co. is celebrating its grand opening today so we had to stop in and give them a proper review. Upon entering Mayport Brewing Co. you are immediately hit with a super clean aesthetic that looks more like a fancy, upscale bar than a brewery but that isn’t a bad thing at all. Mayport Brewing is super spacious inside and there is plenty of seating available – they have two bars available, couches, chairs, little tables sprinkled throughout, and a massive outdoor beer garden area. That being said, we were there at 5:30 p.m. during their grand opening and we couldn’t move about the brewery bar freely as it was absolutely packed. I know that is great news for them because it seems like they have a ton of local support but for us it meant waiting about 20 minutes to get two beers. It surely won’t be like that all the time so I will give them the benefit of the doubt but the cocktails are what was killing them as they take longer to make and look up should the bartender not know how to make something. Anyways, let’s move on with the review! Duckpin Bowling – Mayport Brewing Co. The adult games are a pretty cool addition to the brewery as well. I had never heard of Duckpin Bowling until I visited Mayport Brewing but I am definitely a fan now – it is basically like a handheld, mini version of bowling – we will definitely be going back to give it a shot once the crowd that was there during the grand opening has subsided. Bumper Pool – Mayport Brewing Co. In addition to duckpin bowling, they do have a shuffleboard table (my favorite game) ,  traditional pool table as well as a bumper pool table which I had never seen and it looks quite interesting. Okay, now that we’ve gone over the overall look and feel of Mayport Brewing Co. it’s now time to dig into the most important part, our review of the beer! Mayport Brewing Co. Beer Beer on Tap – Mayport Brewing Co. While the name suggests it is a brewery, Mayport Brewing Co. does not brew beer on site but they do have 6 of their own beers on tap as well as a ton of guest taps with some impressive beer that you don’t find too often – they had four different beers from Maine Beer Company which is awesome. Below you can find the complete tap list during their grand opening and the 38 different beers they had on tap: Tap List – Mayport Brewing Co. Flights of beer are not yet available as it is their grand opening but will be in the future. Erik and I wanted to try as many of their beers as we could but we could only get one round as the wait was just too long during the grand opening to go back for another. We will definitely be visiting again to try out some of the guest taps and the remainder of their beers. Being that Erik and I both like IPAs we went with the two that Mayport Brewing Company had to offer, let’s take a quick look at what we thought about them: Porch Pirate Hazy Porch Pirate Hazy – Mayport Brewing Co. Type: Hazy IPA ABV: 6% I ordered their hazy IPA as that is one of my favorite styles of beer and it was pretty tasty I must say – I am looking forward to see what other IPAs they release in the future. Tim Toddler’s DIPA Toddler’s DIPA – Mayport Brewing Co. Type: Double IPA ABV: 8.0% Erik ordered this one which is definitely a west coast style DIPA and he enjoyed it while I will take the hazy for sure – it definitely goes down smooth for a double IPA though so be careful with this one. Tim Despite the chaos of it being the grand opening, I can see Mayport Brewing Co. being a spot we keep an eye out on their tap list for the crazy guest taps they have. I’d be more than happy to stop in after pizza and a beer at Reve Brewing which is right down the road to have a few hard-to-find beers and get in a game of duckpin bowling at Mayport. It’s worth mentioning that with the fancy aesthetic and adult games comes the unfortunate fact that it is 21+ only – no kiddos or dogs allowed. I know this may cause a bit of an uproar for some and coming from someone that completed the entire Jax Ale Trail with my 16–month old I get it but I also understand that Mayport Brewing Co. wants a more adult atmosphere and that is 100% okay – get a babysitter and come check this place out! About Mayport Brewing Co. About Mayport Brewing Co. “Welcome to Mayport Brewing Company, where we bring the beach back to Mayport! Our 4 owners have collectively over 100 years at the beaches, and we’re here to bring the community together and remind everyone that Mayport IS the beach. With 40 taps, a full liquor and wine bar, and plenty of fun activities, Mayport Brewing Company is your new neighborhood spot!” Website: Mayport Brewing Co. Mayport Brewing Co. on Instagram Mayport Brewing Co. on Untappd Mayport Brewing Co. Logo Mayport Brewing Co. Logo Mailing Address: Mayport Brewing Co. 2152 Mayport Rd Jacksonville, Florida 32233 Phone Number: 904-720-2739 Email: [email protected] Thank you for checking out our review of Mayport Brewing Co. in Jacksonville, Florida. Do you have any recommendations of other breweries in the area? Comment below! The Review Mayport Brewing Co. 4.5 Score Mayport Brewing Co. is the newest brewery to open up in Jacksonville, Florida and has a lot of potential. While I would call it more of a bar with beer on tap, that shouldn't deter you from checking this place out as they have 30+ different beers available, some of which are super hard-to-find and worth the visit. Stop by to get in a game of duckpin bowling while you sip on some craft beer from all over the country. PROS 30+ Beers on Tap Fun Adult Games Full Liquor Bar Plenty of Space (When It's Not The Grand Opening) CONS 21+ Not Dog-Friendly Review Breakdown Rating Tags: Craft Beer Duckpin Bowling Florida Jacksonville Mayport Brewing Co. GARRETT MARRERO, OWNER AND FOUNDER OF MAUI BREWING CO. NOMINATED FOR ENTREPRENEUR OF THE YEAR AWARD - Maui Brewing Company NEWS EVENTS SHOP JOBS CONTACT DISCOVER OUR BEER TASTE OUR SODAS VISIT OUR RESTAURANTS EXPERIENCE OUR BREWERY Sustainability Brewery Tours Kegs FIND OUR BEER  VISIT OUR RESTAURANTS KIHEI BREWERY / RESTAURANT KAHANA RESTAURANT KA’ANAPALI RESTAURANT WAIKIKI RESTAURANT KAILUA RESTAURANT TASTE OUR SODAS DISCOVER OUR BEER EXPERIENCE OUR BREWERY Brewery Tours Kegs FIND OUR BEER NEWS EVENTS SHOP JOBS CONTACT Instagram Facebook Twitter © 2021 Maui Brewing Co. All Rights Reserved. GARRETT MARRERO, OWNER AND FOUNDER OF MAUI BREWING CO. NOMINATED FOR ENTREPRENEUR OF THE YEAR AWARD by newmauibrewingcompany | Apr 6, 2018 Kihei, Hawaii (April 6, 2018) – Maui Brewing Company is honored to announce its founder, Garrett Marrero, has been nominated and is a semi-finalist in Ernst & Young’s Entrepreneur Of The Year® 2018 Greater Los Angeles Awards program which includes Las Vegas and Hawaii. As the world’s most prestigious business award for entrepreneurs, Entrepreneur Of The Year® has been at the forefront of identifying game‐changing entrepreneurs for more than three decades. The program has recognized the inspirational leadership of such entrepreneurs as Howard Schultz of Starbucks Coffee Company, John Mackey of Whole Foods Market Inc., Pierre Omidyar of eBay, Inc., Jeff Weiner of LinkedIn Corporation and Mindy Grossman of HSN, Inc. Maui Brewing Company is honored to have Garrett recognized among so many other notable business luminaries in Greater Los Angeles. Nominator Bob Stein, Executive Director of the Institute of Entrepreneurial Excellence at the University of Pittsburgh, states, “As a long time Maui Brewing customer, follower and fan, I recognized Garrett’s entrepreneurial spirit as he led the company to be the largest craft brewer in Hawaii. His ingenuity and creativity for product lines, as well as support for locally sourced ingredients and other small businesses shows what kind of entrepreneur he really has become. The growth he has achieved in such a short time is rare in his industry.” Marrero states, “It’s always an honor to be recognized for the work you put in. In the case of this prestigious award I’m proud to have been nominated by our fan and friend Bob Stein and selected as a semi-finalist. This award recognizes the work of not just myself, but that of the amazing teammates at Maui Brewing Co. without whom none of this would be possible. I also love bringing home the recognition for our great State of Hawai’i, Maui nō ka ‘oi!” MBC is a fiercely local company and has remained steadfast regarding local production. The MBC team are stewards of their communities and the ‘aina, and curators of the craft beer way of life. Their beers have been recognized worldwide for quality and innovation. For more information, visit MauiBrewing.com or follow @MauiBrewingCo on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. About Us - Manhattan Brewing Company Skip to main content We use cookies to improve site performance and your experience. View our privacy policy for more information OK Go Home About Us Beers MBC Lounge MBC Catering The Brew Deck Join Our Team Shop Wing Wars Contact Us Our Story About Us We're ready to share our beers with Manhattan. With nearly 20 years of collective experience in the craft beer industry, we're focused on brewing and serving high-quality craft beers in a family-friendly atmosphere in the heart of downtown Manhattan. This town is our home, and we want to bring the best possible beer experience and education to the wonderful people of Manhattan. We want to create a place for everyone to come out and have a good time with friends and cultivate a craft beer culture Manhattan can be proud of. Our Team The best and brightest Co-Owners Portraits by Killian Millner Adam Krebsbach Brewer A native of Norton, Kansas, who moved to Manhattan in 2006, Adam's unrelenting creative energy has resulted in a tasty variety of imaginative beers. A tinkerer at heart, Adam is the yin to Garrett's yang; for every traditional style brewed by Garrett, you'll find Adam experimenting with an array of unique ingredients into his beers to challenge and delight beer fans. Adam loves drinking American pale ales, robust porters and Belgian tripels. Garrett Paulman Brewer A professionally trained brewer from the renowned Siebel Institute of Technology in Chicago, Garrett also brings experience in facility management and quality control. Garrett started brewing in 2011 before making the leap to attend Siebel and "turn pro" in 2012. You will find Garrett drinking anything hoppy while laughing with friends, family and strangers at the bar. Although he's a Nebraska native, Garrett, his wife and two children are K-State fans in training. Jake Voegeli Sales & Marketing A former K-State football player from Wichita, Kansas, who bleeds purple with his wife and daughter, Jake's journey into craft beer began in college after committing himself to trying a new six pack each week. Jake loves to challenge his palate with hoppy IPAs, sours and barrel-aged stouts, but also loves a well-crafted, delicate pilsner or a traditional English brown ale. An experienced salesman and marketer both in the craft beer and spirits industries, you'll mostly see Jake up front slinging beers or chatting with guests about beer, K-State football, his favorite Ryan Bingham album or his daughter Chloe.
